# File ../lib/sqlpostgres/Select.rb, line 22
    def initialize(connection = Connection.default)
      @connection = connection
      @tables = []
      @columns = []
      @joins = []
      @order_by = []
      @where = []
      @group_by = []
      @having = []
      @limit = nil
      @offset = nil
      @distinct = false
      @distinct_on = []
      @set_ops = []
      @for_update = false
    end
